ðŸ“– Summary: The BizGen repository provides inference code and pretrained models for generating infographics and slides from article-level business content. It supports long context lengths, enabling the creation of ultra-dense layouts with high-quality visual text rendering in multiple languages. The system offers flexibility in image generation through layer-wise detail refinement.
